about_the_game: These dice won't improve your luck, but they might impress your opponent. This pack includes three exclusive team logos and a dice set for customizing your teams.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood Bowl 3 features Fantasy Violence and Blood.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 GB
